relevant_findings.neurological_status: Alert and oriented with subtle deficits in episodic memory.
relevant_findings.pupils: Round and reactive to light, constricting from 3 mm to 2 mm.
relevant_findings.extraocular_movements: Full, without nystagmus or saccadic breakdown.
relevant_findings.eyelid_appearance: Mild ptosis of the right eyelid.
relevant_findings.tremors: Cheek tremors on smiling, unable to puff cheeks.

motor_examination.strength: 4+ in left-hand fingers, otherwise 5 out of 5.
